function.name: test_function
function.command: cd /; clickhouse-local --input-format TabSeparated --output-format TabSeparated --structure 'x UInt64, y UInt64' --query "SELECT x + y FROM table"

function.name: test_function_with_parameter
function.command: cd /; clickhouse-local --input-format TabSeparated --output-format TabSeparated --structure 'x UInt64, y UInt64' --query "SELECT x + y + {test_parameter : UInt64} FROM table"
